# Introduction

Product of Ajiriwa Network

Pay-R HR System was created to simplify your company hr operations and automating tasks. With Pay-R you can easily manage your company departments, employee data, payroll and others.

This is the official software documentation. You may search for a specific topic using the search box at the top
